articles.description:
RT Streamr Network
The http://thechat.app was created to showcase what can be built on the #Streamr protocol. We hope it inspires the @developer_dao community and welcome their feedback on the beta version!

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Our frens @streamr just went live with http://thechat.app 💬
Don't say we didn't give alpha! 
@mattofontana @nicoburkart
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ertLe1s2orA&ab_channel=DeveloperDAO

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗿
Now that the previous Guild system/model has been abolished, it’s so important that we cultivate far more intuitive and frictionless pathways that empower members to become contributors (if they choose)
https://twitter.com/zanedraas/status/1609673473382834176?s=46&t=axKLIi4-MTKwAfOPO0ZP7g https://t.co/MC5X2QEcQ2



Zane and Draas: Developer DAO currently operates under a ‘Guild’ model, and it’s largely optimized for contributors. Outside of this, there aren’t a lot of ways members can get involved.
𝗢𝗕𝗦𝗘𝗥𝗩𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡
Guilds conflate contributors and non-contributors — often leading to some confusion. https://t.co/FEP8LMni0r
articles.title: Re 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗿 Now that the previous Guild system/model has been abolished, it’s so important that ...

articles.description:
Re The 𝗗𝗗 𝗟𝗮𝗯𝘀 section is officially live in Discord ✅
It is comprised of forum-based channels — and over time, tasks and roles under DD Labs will be shared as forum posts. DAO members can then asks teams clarifying questions, and easily obtain context inside each post! ☺️ https://t.co/KTZ0yyv8uy
